info.name: Shothik AI - Summarize APIs
info.description:
Complete API collection for Summarize product/service in Shothik AI v3.

The Summarize service helps condense long text content into concise summaries with customizable length and format options.

**Base URL:** https://api-qa.shothik.ai/api

**Total APIs:** 2 endpoints

request.description:
Summarize text content into a short paragraph format.

**Modes:**
- `Paragraph`: Flowing paragraphs
- `Key Sentences`: Bullet-point format

**Lengths:**
- `short`: ~20% of original
- `regular`: ~40% of original
- `medium`: ~60% of original
- `long`: ~80% of original

**⚠️ IMPORTANT:** This endpoint returns a streaming response. Postman may show 'Connection closed' error. Use curl instead:

```
curl -X POST 'https://api-qa.shothik.ai/api/summarize' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'Accept: */*' \
  -H 'Connection: keep-alive' \
  -H 'authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN' \
  --data-raw '{...}'
```

item.name: Keyword Extraction
item.description: API for extracting keywords from text

request.description:
Extract important keywords from text content. These keywords can then be used to focus the summary on specific topics.

**Note:** Minimum text length of 10 characters required.
